content.title: Mapping Services to UI Elements
content.body:
1. From the left pane of the mapping editor, expand Services > Service - RecipientStorage$Recipients$get > records {collection}.
  2. From the right pane of the mapping editor, expand Forms > frmDetails.
  3. In the Mapping Editor, map the following service parameters to the UI elements:
    • From the left pane select RecipientID {number}.
      From the right pane expand Label - lblRecipientIDValue and select text {string}
      Iris displays an alert regarding a mismatch of data types, click OK.
